response.name: ApiKey Secret Malformed

Bad Request
Success
Success
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "status": "OK",
    "message": "Success",
    "data": {
        "kubeConfig": "apiVersion: v1
kind: Config
clusters:
    - name: worker-1
      cluster:
        server: https://35.185.192.225
        certificate-authority-data: 
users:
    - name: afternoon-workspace
      user:
        token: eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImtsMUNpZDR5ZmlKb2dsVzVOTjFmdGN0emhKbjR2dEh5RWN2RmYtaTRNS28ifQ..JlJsoOBALHiElBi13xFDLv1aljZT959ROi-nXsA-PRqFYhnGrV_yI6qvdkapR8_YTlugVdhdxIhrCppWhKsCeX0g3wT2tmjV90rcJXia1jejUmhfIwkxOj2R2-N57UfSB5dIb1DPZ_XX21yxJhcBua3GAe0v908wiMRTj_BlLVZyOj31d2d_0M4aQl2JCe0tUg4pL0BBEavk-cUXLHC8wOlT2BlmMqq6G1m3ZZPcrW4Eljt17OZVpGlMIjR4ZN1ag78fSFhr2trPkQNEYygIGJBI5oLDYH04SHURvJMA-LIqWodoLJq-s7uhgZFi4UfIp5m6bw2UATWt8AyffDnLww
contexts:
    - name: afternoon-workspace@worker-1
      context:
        cluster: worker-1
        user: afternoon-workspace
        namespace: namespace-3
current-context: afternoon-workspace@worker-1
"
    }
}
